scripts.electron:build: node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js && vue-cli-service electron:build
scripts.electron:serve: node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js && vue-cli-service electron:serve
scripts.cross-package-win: node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js win32 x64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --win --x64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-win32: node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js win32 ia32 && vue-cli-service electron:build --win --ia32 -p never
scripts.cross-package-linux: node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js linux x64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --x64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-linux-arm64: node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js linux arm64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --arm64 -p never
scripts.cross-package-mac: node scripts/del.js ./marswrapper.node && node scripts/copy-proto.js darwin x64 && vue-cli-service electron:build --mac --x64 -p never
